text:
@Tessacan61 Is that why he missed 5 Cobra meetings on the virus or fucked off to Chequers for 2 weeks to sort out his divorce? Or boasted about shaking hands with coronavirus patients and ended up getting it himself?

He’s a fucking ejit and his incompetence has cost thousands of lives
